title: Chirpy Reverie
description:
C H I R P Y   R E V E R I E
Chirpy the Penguin 5

⚠️ADVERTISEMENTS WILL BE REPORTED.⚠️
If the game doesn't load, try refreshing the page a few times.
If it doesn't load after that, try Turbowarp: https://turbowarp.org/434825906

-------------------CONTROLS-------------------
Left/A - Move Left
Right/D - Move Right
Up/W/Z/N - Jump
Space/X/M - Dash
C (While on the World Map) - Save Game

WALKTHROUGH COMING SOON
OST: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PLRr_xbamOfC7Nmy5Nwm86y7lv4i2CBnDS

-------------------STORY-------------------
Chirpy stood there, in a fading world, in front of the god of his world: THE FLAWLESS DEMON. The world was about to be reset. A new world was on the horizon...
Something went horribly wrong.
The next thing he knew, Chirpy was asleep on a mysterious, yet nostalgic shore, with little to no memories of his past. Where to go now?

----------------MAIN CHARACTERS----------------
Chirpy - A young, adventurous penguin who has lost his memory.
Ignis - A enigmatic, yet timid green spirit, who aids Chirpy through giving him the DASH.
???? - A spear-wielding soldier from a far-off land.

-------------------TIPS-------------------
-Don't dash too early. wait until you're at the apex of your jump.
-Hold the dash button to stay aiming a little longer. It'll help with beginners.
-SAVE OFTEN, and especially before attempting EX levels.

#games #all
